description-fr_FR-print:
Le moniteur Samsung HDTV série 7 est équipé de la nouvelle technologie WiDi (Wireless Display, ou « affichage sans fil »), qui vous permet d’afficher les contenus tels que des films, de la musique, des photos et bien plus encore provenant de périphériques compatibles à proximité. Vous pouvez ainsi profiter de tous vos contenus préférés sur un écran plus grand et de meilleure qualité. La connexion directe au Smart Hub et l'adaptateur réseau local sans file vous permet en outre d'accéder à bon nombre d'applications, de contenus et de réseaux sociaux en ligne. Donnez une nouvelle dimension à votre expérience de divertissement numérique en bénéficiant d’un plus grand écran et de fonctionnalités innovantes.
Les applications Smart Hub changent votre vision du moniteur
La fonction Samsung Smart Hub montre tout son potentiel lorsqu'elle est utilisée avec le moniteur HDTV série 7. Grâce à une clé électronique ou à une connexion LAN, la large palette de contenus, y compris quelques centaines d’applications, est désormais disponible sans même devoir allumer votre ordinateur portable ou de bureau. Vous pouvez ainsi accéder à vos sites de réseaux sociaux tels que Facebook et Twitter et mettre à jour ou consulter les dernières nouvelles. Cette option, pionnière sur le marché, changera rapidement votre façon d’interagir avec votre moniteur. Accédez donc à un nouveau monde grâce à votre moniteur HDTV série 7.
Connectez-vous sans fil et partagez plus sur davantage d’écrans
Libérez votre contenu des câbles et utilisez plusieurs écrans grâce à la technologie WiDi (Wireless Display). La nouvelle technologie WiDi fournie par Intel détecte automatiquement les périphériques compatibles afin que vous puissiez profiter du contenu multimédia de votre PC sur un plus grand écran en Full HD. Il s’agit d’une technologie idéale pour les présentations, pour étendre votre bureau ou encore pour la réalisation de plusieurs tâches simultanément. Vous pouvez par exemple regarder un film sur le moniteur tout en travaillant sur votre ordinateur portable, et même le commander depuis une autre pièce.
Elargissez votre expérience grâce à diverses entrées
Pourquoi ne pas donner vie à autre chose que vos films favoris ? Grâce à ses diverses entrées, le moniteur HDTV à 2 entrées HDMI de Samsung garantit des opérations en ligne simplifiées, comme par exemple les jeux ou le chat en ligne avec des amis. Les différentes entrées telles que DP et HDMI vous garantissent en effet que votre moniteur est encore plus compatible et prêt à traiter tous vos contenus.
Accédez à votre contenu et diffusez-le sans fil
Profitez au mieux de tous vos contenus et appareils grâce au partage sans fil. En effet, avec AllShare Play, vous pouvez lire des films, des photos, de la musique, et plus encore, depuis n’importe quel appareil compatible situé à proximité, y compris un ordinateur, sur le moniteur HDTV série 7. En outre, la technologie Cloud et le stockage Web de Samsung vous offrent encore plus de liberté et de mobilité afin que vous puissiez également atteindre et partager des contenus multimédias lorsque vous êtes loin de chez vous. Profitez dès à présent de tous vos contenus favoris, que vous soyez en face de votre téléviseur ou loin de lui.
Améliorez votre image en passant de votre mobile à un moniteur
Vous pouvez désormais apprécier votre divertissement sur un luxueux moniteur de taille standard afin de profiter d’images de qualité supérieure grâce au Mobile High-Definition Link (MHL). Le Mobile High-Definition Link (MHL) vous permet de regarder des vidéos ou tout autre contenu lors de vos déplacements, puis de connecter facilement l’appareil mobile à un moniteur via le câble fourni. En outre, vous pouvez terminer de regarder votre contenu dans une incroyable qualité HD, où que vous soyez, tout en rechargeant les appareils connectés. Combinez la portabilité au confort pour profiter d’un plaisir visuel optimisé.
description-fr_FR-mobile: Choisissez un moniteur aux multiples connexions afin d’étendre votre expérience de divertissement multimédia à domicile.
description-en_US-print:
The Samsung Series 7 HDTV monitor features new WiDi (Wireless Display) technology that allows compatible devices nearby to share movies, music, photos and more. You can enjoy all your favourite content on a bigger and better screen. With direct connection to Smart Hub and a wireless LAN adaptor, you’ll also access apps, content and online social networks. Take your entertainment experience to the next level on a bigger screen with innovative new features.
Wirelessly connect and share on more screens
Set content free from cables and make use of more screens with Wireless Display (WiDi) technology. New WiDi powered by Intel automatically detects compatible devices, letting you enjoy your note PC’s multimedia content on a larger monitor screen in full HD. It’s perfect for presentations, expanding your desktop or multitasking. You can play a movie on the monitor while you work on your notebook, and even control it from another room.
Smart hub apps enhance your monitor experience
Samsung Smart Hub is capable of so much more when used in conjunction with the HDTV monitor Series 7. Utilising a wireless dongle of LAN connection, the wide variety of content, including 100s of apps, is now available without even having to turn on your laptop of pc. This also includes accessing your social network sites such as Facebook and Twitter, letting you update and check is an industry first and will quickly change the way you interact with your monitor. So, turn on to a new world with your HDTV monitor Series 7.
Hassle-free wireless access for your devices
Keep all your devices connected - without long network cables. This monitor functions as a wireless access point, so you can connect all your compatible devices and say goodbye to LAN lines. You’ll cut down clutter and keep your space tidy, with no need to buy and install a separate wireless router. Enjoy a world of hassle-free work and entertainment possibilities thanks to connectivity you can share.
Enhance viewing from mobile to monitor
With Mobile High-Definition Link (MHL), experience entertainment with full-size monitor luxury and higher-quality HD viewing. MHL lets you watch video and other content on the move, then easily connect the mobile device to a monitor with the included cable. You can finish viewing in stunning HD anywhere you want, and charge devices while connected, too. Combine portability with home comfort for an optimised view.
Wirelessly access and stream your content
Make the most of all your content and devices with wireless sharing. Thanks to AllShare Play, you can stream movies, photos, music and more from any compatible devices nearby, including PCs through the HDTV monitor Series 7. Cloud technology and Samsung web storage give you even greater freedom and mobility, allowing you to access and share multimedia when you’re away from home, too. Now you can enjoy all your favourite content on your monitor or away from it.
description-en_US-mobile: Choose a well-connected monitor to expand your home entertainment experience.
name: Samsung T24B750EW

description-fr_FR-print:
Le moniteur Samsung TV HD Série 7 et ses nouvelles fonctionnalités WIDI (Wireless Display), permet aux périphériques compatibles de partager sans fil des films, de la musique, des photos et plus encore. Vous pouvez profiter de tous vos contenus préférés sur un écran plus grand et plus performant. Avec une connexion directe au portail d’applications et à l’aide d'un adaptateur LAN sans fil, vous aurez également accès à des applications, à du contenu et aux réseaux sociaux. Portez votre divertissement à un niveau supérieur sur un écran plus grand avec de nouvelles fonctionnalités innovantes.
Un moniteur “Smart hub” améliore considérablement votre expérience
Le moniteur « Smart Hub » Série 7 est capable d’énormément de choses lorsque vous utilisez les fonctionnalités HD TV. Le dongle sans fil de connexion au réseau local vous ouvre les portes à un contenu varié, notamment à plus de 100 applications. Cela inclut également l'accès à vos sites de réseaux sociaux tels que Facebook et Twitter, qui vous permettent de mettre à jour et vérifier vos status, une première dans l'industrie et qui va rapidement changer la façon dont vous interagissez avec votre moniteur. Tournez-vous sur un nouveau monde avec votre moniteur TV HD Série 7.
Connexion sans fil et partagez sur plus d'écrans
Débarrassez-vous des câbles et tirez profit de plus d'écrans avec la technologie « Wireless Display » (WiDi). Développé par Intel, le WiDi détecte automatiquement les périphériques compatibles, vous permettant de profiter du contenu de votre PC portable sur un moniteur plus grand et en full HD. Une technologie rêvée pour toutes vos présentations. Imaginez que dorénavant vous pouvez lire un film sur le moniteur pendant que vous travaillez sur votre ordinateur portable, et même le contrôler depuis une autre pièce.
Une expérience sans limite grâce à de nombreuses entrées vidéo
Ne vous limitez plus seulement à vos films préférés ! Les moniteurs Samsung possèdent 2 entrées HDMI ainsi qu’un large éventail d’entrées permettant tous les usages : jeux vidéo, photos, vidéo, chaque expérience devient intense et incroyablement vivante. Les différentes entrées telles que Display Port, HDMI etc. assurent une parfaite compatibilité de votre moniteur à tous vos périphériques.
Le sans fil pour streamer vos contenus
Profitez de tous vos contenus et périphériques avec le partage sans fil. Grâce à AllShare, vous pouvez streamer des films, photos, musique et bien plus encore à partir des appareils compatibles à proximité, y compris les PC par le biais du moniteur Série 7. Les technologies Samsung Cloud et de Stockage en ligne vous donnent encore plus de liberté et de mobilité, vous permettant d'accéder et de partager tout ce que vous voulez, même lorsque vous êtes loin de la maison.
Le moniteur de votre Smartphone
Grâce à la technologie MHL (Mobile High-Definition Link), faites l’expérience inédite d’afficher vos contenus mobiles sur grand écran en HD. La technologie MHL vous permet de regarder des vidéos, d’afficher des photos et de jouer simplement en connectant votre téléphone compatible Android à l’aide du câble fourni. La technologie MHL permet de profiter des contenus tout en rechargeant la batterie du téléphone. Combinez mobilité et plaisir d’être à la maison pour une expérience enrichie en confort.

With the U Series, you can connect multiple network monitors to a single host PC using a USB cable. Monitors can serve as an independent PC for users to perform various tasks. Without any installation process, monitors can easily be connected to the host via USB, making multi-computing easier than ever. In addition, the LG Network Monitor U Series minimizes initial set up cost and power consumption as well as reduces the maintenance time and cost associated with multiple PC’s. The U Series platform is optimized for various computing environments such as SMB, public area, etc. where word processing, video playing, internet, e-mail, and simple applications are used. Especially for education institutions, U series empowers educators, engages students, and makes learning personal.

description-en_US-print: Monitor equipped with Samsung’s unique color engine and White LED-backlight (WLED), has higher color accuracy requirements, color temperature and brightness. The new monitors’ highest response time is 5ms and also features MEGA DCR technology, which enhances dynamic contrast 5,000,000:1 in textural images. Diversified “Magic” functions allow you to extend its viewing angle so the screen always appears as if viewed face-on. See it your way with wider viewing angles How do you like to watch movies? Do you like lying down on the couch? Sitting in your favorite chair? Cooking or exercising? Whether you’re standing, sitting or lying down, Samsung Magic Angle makes sure that the movie always takes center stage and that you’re always comfortable. This means, thanks to the 5-mode angle management, that whatever angle you watch your Samsung monitor, you will enjoy a full visual experience with amazing picture clarity. So, start seeing your favourite movies and other multimedia in total comfort and without limitations thanks to Magic Angle. Control brightness, conserve energy Eco saving makes saving energy easy. It adjusts the brightness of your Samsung monitor based on how much energy you want to save. And with the choice of three energy saving modes (50%, 25% and Power Saving off), you can really tailor your monitor use to meet your own personal needs. Samsung’s commitment to saving energy is designed to help both you and the environment, and with up to 50% saving on consumption, you can really make a positive impact on your eco footprint. Take the effort out of saving energy and take control with Eco saving.
description-en_US-mobile: 58.42 cm (23 ") , 1920 x 1080, 250 cd/m², 5 ms, Mega DCR, HDMI, D-Sub, 30W
description-de_DE-print: Sehen, wie Sie es wollen dank des größeren Betrachtungswinkels Wie sehen Sie sich am liebsten Filme an? Während Sie auf dem Sofa liegen? Von Ihrem Lieblingsstuhl aus? Beim Kochen oder bei Fitnessübungen? Egal, ob Sie stehen, sitzen oder liegen: Mit Samsungs MagicAngle können Sie Filme immer im richtigen Blickwinkel und aus einer komfortablen Lage sehen. Mit dem 5stufigen Winkelmanagement können Sie aus jedem Winkel auf Ihren Samsung-Monitor sehen und erhalten immer das beste visuelle Erlebnis mit atemberaubender Bildschärfe. Machen Sie es sich für Ihre Lieblingsfilme oder andere Multimediainhalte also dank MagicAngle bequem. Regeln Sie die Helligkeit und sparen Sie Energie Dank Eco Saving ist Strom sparen ein Kinderspiel. Die Helligkeit des Samsung-Monitors wird an Ihre Energiesparwünsche angepasst. Und mit den drei Energiesparmodi (50%, 25% und Energiesparmodus aus) können Sie den Monitor an Ihre persönlichen Bedürfnisse optimal anpassen. Samsung hat sich verschrieben, Energie zu sparen und das kommt Ihnen und der Umwelt zugute. Dank der 50% Einsparmöglichkeiten beim Energieverbrauch betreiben Sie auch noch aktiven Umweltschutz. Mit Eco Saving übernehmen Sie das Ruder und Energiesparen macht keine Mühe mehr.

description-fr_FR-print: Le moniteur e2219Ph allie technologie innovante, design attrayant et ergonomie de pointe. Grâce à sa fonction pivot à 90°, cet écran Full HD de 55,8 cm (22″) passe en quelques secondes du mode paysage au mode portrait - un atout pour les applications de traitement d’image ou traitement de texte. Non seulement réglable en hauteur, l’écran est également inclinable et dispose d’une fonction de rotation horizontale. Il est par ailleurs doté d’une connectique très complète comprenant une entrée analogique D-Sub et deux entrées numériques (DVI-D et HDMI). Détails sur le produit - Inputs: D-SUB, DVI-D, HDMI - 1680 x 1050 maximum resolution - Special Features: -5°~+20° Tilt,-2°~92° Pivot,5:4 switch,110 mm Height Adjustment,Eco Mode,e-Saver,i-Menu,Kensington Security Lock,Low-Power,Off Timer,screen+,VESA 100 mm - 250 cd/m² (typ) cd/m² - 2 ms GtG
description-en_US-print: Modern LED backlight technology, an attractive design and top ergonomics is offered by the e2219Ph. Thanks to the pivot feature, the 55.8 cm (22″) Full HD panel in 16:10 format can be positioned in portrait format within seconds – convenient for image and word processing. In addition to height adjustability, the display is also tiltable and swivel-mounted. Besides a D-Sub port, the model comes with two digital inputs (DVI-D, HDMI). Product Details - Inputs: D-SUB, DVI-D, HDMI - 1680 x 1050 maximum resolution - Special Features: -5°~+20° Tilt,-2°~92° Pivot,5:4 switch,110 mm Height Adjustment,Eco Mode,e-Saver,i-Menu,Kensington Security Lock,Low-Power,Off Timer,screen+,VESA 100 mm - 250 cd/m² (typ) cd/m² - 2 ms GtG
description-de_DE-print: Moderne LED-Backlight-Technologie, attraktives Design und Top-Ergonomie bietet der e2219Ph. Das 55,8 cm (22")-Full-HD-Panel im Format 16:10 lässt sich dank Pivot-Funktion sekundenschnell in die Senkrechte bringen - praktisch bei Bild- und Textverarbeitung. Zusätzlich zu Höhenverstellbarkeit verfügt das Display auch über eine Neige- und Schwenkfunktion. Neben einer D-Sub-Schnittstelle bietet das Modell zwei digitale Eingänge (DVI-D, HDMI). Produktdetails - Eingänge: D-SUB, D-DVI, HDMI - 1680 x 1050 maximale Auflösung - Special Features: -5°~+20° Tilt,-2°~92° Pivot,5:4 switch,110 mm Height Adjustment,Eco Mode,e-Saver,i-Menu,Kensington Security Lock,Low-Power,Off Timer,screen+,VESA 100 mm - 250 cd/m² (typ) cd/m² - 2 ms GtG
name: AOC e2219Ph

description-fr_FR-print: PA238Q Un outil professionnel complet - Moniteur LED 23" à affichage Full HD; - Dalle P-IPS affichant 98% du profil Adobe RGB et offrant un angle de vision de 178°; - Un écran calibré en sortie d'usine pour une excellente fidélité des couleurs; - Technologie QuickFit Virtual Scale permettant de visualiser ses documents à échelle réelle. Des couleurs d’une incroyable précision Une précision incroyable grâce à un faible Delta E Chaque moniteur PA238Q est calibré avec une mesure ΔE (Delta E) ne dépassant pas 5. Cette faible valeur assure un affichage précis des couleurs et garantit donc une excellente fidélité d'affichage. Un angle de vision de 178° Le PA238Q propose un angle de vision de 178°, à l'horizontale comme à la verticale, qui évite la modification des couleurs quelle que soit votre position et celle de l'écran. Une gradation des couleurs parfaite grâce à une LUT (Look-Up Table) de 10 bits Le PA238Q intègre une LUT de 10 bits créant une meilleure profondeur pour chaque couleur du profil RGB par rapport aux LUT de 8 bits trouvées sur les moniteurs standards. La LUT de 10 bits apporte une gradation des couleurs plus fluide et une résolution plus précise. Des solutions conviviales Technologie QuickFit Virtual Scale La technologie exclusive QuickFit Virtual Scale intégrée au PA238Q permet un affichage des documents et des photos à échelle réelle et offre également un mode quadrillage. La technologie QuickFit Virtual Scale s'active simplement en appuyant sur un bouton et vous servira de guide pour avoir un aperçu précis de votre travail ou de vos photos. - Formats supportés : - Documents : A4, lettre - Photos : 8”x10”, 5”x7”, 4”x6”, 3”x5”, 2”x2” - Quadrillages : Alignement, Centimètres, Pouces Un confort d'utilisation maximal Le PA238Q propose un support ajustable permettant un réglage de la hauteur de 100 mm, un réglage de l'inclinaison allant de -5° à +20°, une rotation de 60° et il est même positionnable en mode portrait. Personnalisez vos couleurs Le PA238Q vous permet de personnaliser la nuance et la saturation de 6 couleurs (rouge, vert, bleu, cyan, magenta et jaune) sans affecter les autres couleurs. Picture-in-Picture and Picture-by-Picture Les fonctions Picture-in-Picture et Picture-by-Picture permettent de visualiser deux programmes simultanément dans deux fenêtres distinctes, afin de vous faciliter le travail multitâche. Une connexion sans problème Le PA238Q intègre de nombreux ports, dont DisplayPort, HDMI, DVI et D-sub. Il propose également 4 ports USB 2.0 pour vous faciliter la connexion de périphériques externes. Un écran conçu sans mercure L'écran à rétroéclairage LED du PA238Q a été conçu sans mercure afin d'améliorer ses capacités d'économie d'énergie mais surtout pour aider à la protection de l'environnement. Un design récompensé Le PA238Q a remporté le prix Reddot Design Award 2011 et le prix International Design Excellence Award 2011.
description-fr_FR-mobile: PA238Q - 23" 1920x1080 16:9, 250 cd/m2, 50000000:1, 6ms, 16.7M, HDMI, D-Sub, DisplayPort, DVI-D, 5500g, Noir
description-en_US-print: The Professional Monitor with a Touch of Play - IPS panel with 100% sRGB coverage and 178 wide viewing angle - Every unit is factory-calibrated for superior color fidelity - QuickFit Virtual Scale instantly boosts design efficiency by providing real-size document, photo and grid on screen Ultimate Color Precision High Color Accuracy with Low Delta E Each PA238Q is pre-calibrated with a maximum ΔE (Delta E) of less than 5. Ensures precise reading of color input and guarantees excellent color fidelity 178˚ Wide Viewing Angle PA238Q adopts 178˚ of horizontal and vertical viewing angle that eradicates color shift on your screen no matter where and how you look at it Flawless Gradation with 10-bit Look-up Table PA238Q's built-in internal 10-bit Look-up Table can produce greater depth for each RGB colors than 8-bit Look-up Table in conventional monitors. Resulting in smooth gradation and accurate color resolution User-friendly Solutions QuickFit Virtual Scale The ASUS-exclusive QuickFit built in the monitor provides real-size document, photo, and grid mode on top of the operating windows on the screen. It can activated via a hotkey on monitor and used as a guide to accurately view and edit photos. Supporting Formats: - Document: A4, letter - Photo: 8”x10”, 5”x7”, 4”x6”, 3”x5”, 2”x2” - Grid: Alignment, Centimeters, Inches Versatile Comfort with Ergonomic Design The ergonomically-designed PA238Q Professional Monitor comes with swivel, tilt, pivot, and height adjustments for ideal viewing position. Customized Color Adjustment Customized hue and saturation control with 6 color adjustment allows user to adjust six colors (red, green, blue, cyan, magenta and yellow) independently without effecting other colors. Picture-in-Picture and Picture-by-Picture Picture-in-Picture and Picture-by-Picture allows users to view images from different signals in almost anyway they want Hassle-Free Connection PA238Q comes with rich connectivity including DisplayPort, HDMI, DVI, D-sub. It is also equipped with four USB 2.0 ports so that users could easily connect PA238Q to many peripherals, such as USB drives, keyboard, mouse, digital camera, etc. Mercury-free LED-backlit panel Embedded LED backlight panel helps power saving and environmental protection with no mercury usage. Award-winning Design Reddot Design Award winner 2011

description-en_US-print: PREPARE TO BE DAZZLED. Want deeper blacks and richer colors? LG's LED technology provides even greater control of brightness and delivers better contrast, amazing clarity and color detail, as well as greater energy efficiency compared to conventional LCD monitors. ULTRA SLIM DESIGN You'll love the stunning picture while it's on and marvel at its appearance when it's off. It’s a sleek, elegant design that will appeal to even the most refined sense of style. DOUBLE THE DETAIL. This stunning picture is the reason you wanted HD in the first place. With almost double the pixel resolution, Full HD 1080p gives it superior picture quality over standard resolution. You’ll see details and colors like never before. GET CONNECTED. Make installation of any enabled device a snap. Get deeper colors and take advantage of a Full HD 1080p experience. HDMI connectivity lets you prepare yourself for tomorrow's technology today. SAVE MORE THAN ENERGY. Earning the ENERGY STAR means a product meets strict energy efficiency guidelines set by the US Environmental Protection Agency and the Department of Energy. For Monitors, it means they save energy both in standby and active (when they're on) modes. ENERGY STAR qualified Monitors use about 25% less energy than standard units.

description-en_US-print: See cutting-edge eco solutions through your LED monitor. Impress with the new slim crystal design monitor while you experience mega viewing via Mega Dynamic Contrast Ratio. Enjoy wider viewing angles thanks to Magic Angle as you make a difference for the environment with the new Eco saving modes. Upgrade to the next level with Mega Dynamic Contrast. Experience amazing new levels of color, brilliance and picture quality through the very latest in Mega Dynamic Contrast Ratio. Samsung SA300 monitors deliver images so real-to-life that it will transform your whole viewing experience. Packed with breathtaking 5,000,000:1 contrast ratio, the highest level currently available, the SA300 monitor ensures that blacks are at their absolute darkest and (with pristine whites) colors are at their brightest. You will immediately notice the crystal clear picture and its unbelievable intensity. It is like an explosion of colors and leaves other screens seeming dull in comparison. So, take your viewing pleasure to the next level with Samsung Mega Dynamic Contrast Ratio – and enjoy your multimedia content with the professionalism it deserves. Control brightness, conserve energy. Eco saving makes saving energy easy. It adjusts the brightness of your Samsung monitor based on how much energy you want to save. And with the choice of three energy saving modes (50%, 25% and Power Saving off), you can really tailor your monitor use to meet your own personal needs. Samsung’s commitment to saving energy is designed to help both you and the environment, and with up to 50% saving on consumption, you can really make a positive impact on your eco footprint. Take the effort out of saving energy and take control with Eco saving. See it your way with wider viewing angles. How do you like to watch movies? Do you like lying down on the couch? Sitting in your favorite chair? Cooking or exercising? Whether you’re standing, sitting or lying down, Samsung Magic Angle makes sure that the movie always takes center stage and that you’re always comfortable. This means, thanks to the 5-mode angle management, that whatever angle you watch your Samsung monitor, you will enjoy a full visual experience with amazing picture clarity. So, start seeing your favorite movies and other multimedia in total comfort and without limitations thanks to Magic Angle.

Earth-friendly technologies The S Series uses mercury-free materials and white LED technology for up to 68% lower power consumption, giving you big savings while helping preserve nature's energy resources. description-en_US-print: MW221C - Present clearer and sharper images with Color Shine Technology The MW221C LCD monitor adopts the Color Shine glare-type panel to enrich color density and saturation, clarify image boarders, and further improve image clarity. It presents clear and sharp images in true brilliant vibrant colors perfect for watching movies or playing games. 16:10 Golden Ratio Color Shine Widescreen Offers the Most Panoramic Views 16:10 wide aspect design with 1680 x 1050 high resolution allows for multi-window tasking. The Color Shine glare-type panel is ergonomically designed for watching movies or previewing photos in vivid displays brings more colors to your life! Wide viewing angles make the MW221C perfect for viewing high-quality DVD images. 16.7 million display colors deliver rich and colorful images to surprise your eyes. Fit two A4 size pages on screen The 22" widescreen of MW221C provides a 27% wider viewing area compared with 19" monitors and can also fit two A4 size pages at the same time, meaning ample screen space for different contents. The MW221C helps double your working efficiency. DVI Video Input with HDCP Supported One of the first LCD monitors to incorporate DVI input with HDCP (High-Bandwidth Digital Content Protection) supported to ensure video signal integrety and image quality and prepare for next generation upgrade of computer operation system. Trace Free Technology Delivers 2ms (GTG) extremely quick response time for smoother video display and results in no image delay and ghosting during speedy games. ASCR(ASUS Smart Contrast Ratio) Technology Provides the high contrast ratio of 2000:1, which can dynamically adjust contrast between black and white to provide sharper and brighter images - especially during games and movies.
name: ASUS MW221C LCD Monitor

description-en_US-print: Upgrade to the next level with Mega Dynamic Contrast. Experience amazing new levels of colour, brilliance and picture quality through the very latest in Mega Dynamic Contrast Ratio. Samsung SA300 monitors deliver images so real-to-life that it will transform your whole viewing experience. Packed with breathtaking 5,000,000:1 contrast ratio, the highest level currently available, the SA300 monitor ensures that blacks are at their absolute darkest and (with pristine whites) colours are at their brightest. You will immediately notice the crystal clear picture and its unbelievable intensity. It is like an explosion of colours and leaves other screens seeming dull in comparison. So, take your viewing pleasure to the next level with Samsung Mega Dynamic Contrast Ratio – and enjoy your multimedia content with the professionalism it deserves. Control brightness, conserve energy. Eco saving makes saving energy easy. It adjusts the brightness of your Samsung monitor based on how much energy you want to save. And with the choice of three energy saving modes (50%, 25% and Power Saving off), you can really tailor your monitor use to meet your own personal needs. Samsung’s commitment to saving energy is designed to help both you and the environment, and with up to 50% saving on consumption, you can really make a positive impact on your eco footprint. Take the effort out of saving energy and take control with Eco saving.

The SCALEOVIEW L22W-8 widescreen display offers best performance for the home office and multimedia, such as photo editing and gaming. With its extremely slim and stylish design, the SCALEOVIEW L22W-8 fits perfectly into your home environment.
description-de_DE-print: Der SCALEOVIEW L22W-8 ist ein exzellentes 22-Zoll-TFT-Widescreen-Display für alle Anwendungen zu Hause und im Home-Office. E-mails schreiben, im Internet surfen, die neuesten Spiele ausprobieren oder DVDs anschauen wird durch das große Widescreen-Format und die perfekte Bildwiedergabe besonders komfortabel. Der SCALEOVIEW L22W-8 beeindruckt mit brillanten Farben, gestochen scharfen Bildern und lebensechter Videodarstellung bei hoher Performance und sorgt so -ob bei Office- oder Multimedia-Anwendungen- für ein beeindruckendes Seh-Erlebnis,\nkomplettiert durch eingebaute Lautsprecher und DVI-D Video-Eingang. Sein schlankes und attraktives Design fügt sich harmonisch in jedes Wohn-Umfeld ein.

description-en_US-print: The ViewSonic® VT2755LED is a professional 27" monitor with HDTV functionality. The VT2755LED features “edge white” LED technology delivering brilliant image clarity, high contrast with saturated colors while consuming very low power. Versatile connectivity is provided through HDMI input in addition to PC and traditional YPbPr component video.\n\nA RS232 control port is combined with IR pass through providing automated control for hospitality and commercial installations. Internal programming is offered for users to calibrating the specific operation including a calibration USB cloning function for easy duplication. This includes features such as front panel lockout, volume limitation, active inputs on power up, programmable channel range. Extreme audio includes internal 5W SRS Surround sound performance with SPDIF digital output.
description-en_US-mobile: 68.58 cm (27 ") TFT LCD LED (1920 x 1080) 16:9, 1200:1, 3.4ms, 300 cd/m2, ATSC/NTSC/QAM, HDMI, DVI-D, VGA, RS-232, SPDIF, 27W, 5.95 kg
name: Viewsonic LED LCD VT2755LED

description-en_US-print: The MultiSync P702 follows the tradition of NEC’s professional public display line. The 24/7 proof screen is equipped with a rich and unparalleled feature set, completed by an abundance of interfaces no other product on the market can match. The MultiSync P702 is a Reference Public Display, ideal for reliability, connectivity, flexibility and user friendliness. Designed for a wide array of applications such as retail signage including 24/7, transport applications, control room applications, conference rooms, lobby / reception installations and integration in totems and furniture, the MultiSync P702 offers flexible installation combined with industry leading performance. - DICOM support - for medical applications. - NEC’s dual slot technology - allows for the integration of single board computers and other option slot products without the need to stow external equipment. - Functionality - can be extended with additional interfaces and playback devices through the option slot which avoid additional cables and mounting brackets. - Programmable Ambient Light Sensor - for reduced power consumption and eye pleasing brightness levels. - Ease of Installation and Operation - free LAN control software for central, convenient and cost-efficient maintenance and control. Automatic alarm emails notify the user of problems if they should occur. - Special Characteristics - Advanced fan control; Copy display settings through RS232; DICOM support; Hardware colour calibration possible; Input name adjustment; Matrix memory; OSD rotation for portrait mode; PIN as theft protection; Programmable ambient light sensor; Rapid input switching; Scheduler; Screen saver functions; TileMatrix (10 x 10); User input priority definition; Various picture in picture options.
name: NEC P702

description-fr_FR-print:
Moniteur LED TV T22B300
Une expérience sans limite grâce à de nombreuses entrées vidéo
Ne vous limitez plus seulement à vos films préférés ! Les moniteurs Samsung possèdent 1 entrée HDMI ainsi qu’un large éventail d’entrées permettant tous les usages : jeux vidéo, photos, vidéo, chaque expérience devient intense et incroyablement vivante. Les différentes entrées telles que VGA, HDMI et USB, assurent une parfaite compatibilité de votre moniteur à tous vos périphériques.
Passez au niveau supérieur avec le contraste Mega DCR (Dynamic Contrast Ratio)
Découvrez une image de haute qualité avec une incroyable richesse de couleurs grâce au taux de contraste amélioré (un taux de contraste parmi les plus élevés actuellement disponibles). Le moniteur Samsung T22B300 délivre des images tellement réalistes que vous verrez chaque couleur, chaque détail prendre vie sur votre écran. Vous serez impressionné par la profondeur des noirs et la richesse des couleurs rendant l’image incroyablement naturelle. Elevez votre expérience visuelle à un niveau supérieur et profitez de vos meilleurs contenus grâce au contraste Méga DCR du Samsung T22B300.
Branchez et regardez grâce à ConnectShare™
Connectez une clé USB ou un Disque Dur à votre moniteur pour profiter de vos photos sans avoir à passer par un ordinateur.
description-en_US-print: Make sure you can enjoy all your entertainment. The Samsung B300EW Monitor provides you with HDMI inputs for high-definition viewing, as well as others including DVI and DP. You can also access your favourite videos, photos and music on USB storage thanks to ConnectShare Movie. The monitor’s Mega Dynamic Contrast Ration means you’ll see it all with vivid colour and great clarity, too. And, with Dolby Digital Plus audio, high-quality viewing is complemented by outstanding sound. Expand your experience with various inputs Why not bring more than just your favourite films to life? Samsung’s LED Monitor 2HDMI with its wide range of inputs ensures that everything from gaming to chatting with friends online is easily achieved. The various inputs such as DP, 2HDMI and DVI, ensure that your monitor is more compatible and ready to handle all of your content.

description-de_DE-print: Stärkeres Erlebnis mit verschiedenen Eingängen\n\nWarum sollten Sie nur Ihre Lieblingsfilme lebendig werden lassen? Der 2HDMI-LED-Monitor von Samsung ist mit zahlreichen Eingängen für unzählige Aktivitäten versehen, von Spielen bis hin zum Online-Chat mit Freunden. Die verschiedenen Eingänge (beispielsweise DP, 2HDMI und DVI) erhöhen die Kompatibilität Ihres Monitors für alle Ihre Inhalte.

description-fr_FR-mobile: 60.96 cm (24 ") LED HD 1920X1080 2MS VK248H 50M:1 170/160 HDMI VGA DVI
description-en_US-print: Full HD 1080p Visual Enjoyment Together with Integrated Webcam and HDMI Interface - Full HD LED backlight panel with 50,000,000:1 high contrast ratio, 2ms response time and HDMI input. - Built-in HD webcam for real-time video communication. - QuickFit Virtual Scale instantly boosts design efficiency by providing real-size document, photo and grid on screen. 50,000,000:1 ASUS Smart Contrast Ratio Dynamically enhances the display’s contrast by adjusting the luminance of the backlight to achieve the darkest black and brightest white – delivering lifelike images. Full HD with HDMI Enter a spectacular world of colors with Full HD 1080p (1920x1080) support and HDMI port. 2ms Response Time Quick response time of 2ms (GTG) eliminates ghosting and tracers for more fluid video playback. Aspect Control function Aspect Control function allows users to select a preferred display mode among Full and 4:3 for true-to-life gaming or movie watching without any data loss or image distortion. Real-time Video Communication - Built-in HD webcam is easy to conduct face-to-face live conversations with family, friends or online game partners. - It features Smart EV (Exposure Value) Control technology to cleverly compensate for poor lighting conditions and brings good image quality in comparison to that of the most consumer stand-alone web-cameras. - Plug-and-play for easy connection and easy use through the USB interface without installing extra drivers. - Create your own video clip and side show by bundled LifeFrame2 software. QuickFit Virtual Scale The ASUS-exclusive QuickFit built in the monitor provides real-size document, photo, and grid mode on top of the operating windows on the screen. It can activated via a hotkey on monitor and used as a guide to accurately view and edit photos. Supporting Formats: - Document: letter. - Photo: 8”x10”, 5”x7”, 4”x6”, 3”x5”, 2”x2”. - Alignment Grid. Splendid™ Video Intelligence Technology The exclusive Splendid Video Intelligence Technology optimizes video performance and image fidelity by enhancing color, brightness, contrast, and sharpness. 6 preset video modes (Scenery, Theater, Game, Night View, sRGB and Standard) can be selected via a hotkey. Stylish and User-friendly Design for Modern Sophistication - The glossy piano-black and slim frame front bezel exudes the most enduring classics of style. - Convenient key controls for functional set-up in the multi-language OSD. - Built-in hidden stereo speakers for multimedia enjoyment. - Cable manager gets rid of tangling cables and wires. - Easily detachable base for wall mount. - VESA Wall Mount Standard (100 x 100 mm ). - 25° ( forward 5°, backwards 20° )Tilting Angle. - KENSINGTON Security Lock. Greener Materials - Mercury-free LED-backlit panel. - Corrugated cardboard packaging with at least 80% recycled content. - Slim-flat packaging allows more cartons to be fitted per cargo, reducing transportation costs and CO₂ emission.
name: ASUS VK248H

description-en_US-print: Lean back and enjoy a sharp, dazzling Full HD view while surfing the Web, working on a project, editing video or streaming shows online with the V7 LED215W2 21.5-inch widescreen LED monitor.\n\nUtilizing the latest technology for reduced energy consumption the monitor incorporates light-emitting diodes (LEDs) for backlighting that help create deeper blacks for high 1000:1 dynamic contrast, brilliant color and sharp clarity. It combines all the high screen performance and environmental features to help you “go green”.

Bei einer Auflösung von 1920x1080 (Full HD), einem Kontrast von 1000:1 und einer Helligkeit von 250 cd/m² lässt sich das Gerät dank umfangreicher Einstellungen perfekt auf Ihre individuellen Bedürfnisse einstellen.
Das 21,5“ Widescreen Display befindet sich in einem formschönen, pianolack schwarzen Gehäuse, welches lediglich 2,9kg wiegt und ohne Standfuß lediglich 3.2 cm tief ist.

High screen performance includes 1000:1 dynamic contrast ratio, 250 cd/m² brightness, 5 ms response time, while contributing to reducing our environmental footprint. This sleek LED widescreen monitor is a great value and looks sharp on every desktop.

description-de_DE-print:
Lehnen Sie sich zurück und genießen Sie die Bildqualität des neuen V7 Full HD Monitor LED236W3, während Sie im Internet surfen, an einem Projekt arbeiten, Computerspiele spielen etc.

Bei einer Auflösung von 1920x1080 (Full HD), einem Kontrast von 1000:1 und einer Helligkeit von 250 cd/m² lässt sich das Gerät dank umfangreicher Einstellungen perfekt auf Ihre individuellen Bedürfnisse einstellen.
Das 23,6“ Widescreen Display befindet sich in einem formschönen, pianolack schwarzen Gehäuse, welches lediglich 4.2 kg wiegt und ohne Standfuß lediglich 3.3 cm tief ist.

Dank eines zusätzlichen HDMI Eingangs lassen sich zudem umfangreiche Endgeräte an den V7 LED236W3 anschließen. Der Monitor lässt sich extrem einfach an einer Wandhalterung montieren und bietet ein hervorragendes Preis-Leistungsverhältnis.

description-en_US-print: Upgrade to the next level with Mega Dynamic Contrast. Experience amazing new levels of colour, brilliance and picture quality through the very latest in Mega Dynamic Contrast Ratio. Samsung SA300 monitors deliver images so real-to-life that it will transform your whole viewing experience. Packed with breathtaking 5000000:1 contrast ratio, the highest level currently available, the SA300 monitor ensures that blacks are at their absolute darkest and (with pristine whites) colours are at their brightest. You will immediately notice the crystal clear picture and its unbelievable intensity. It is like an explosion of colours and leaves other screens seeming dull in comparison. So, take your viewing pleasure to the next level with Samsung Mega Dynamic Contrast Ratio – and enjoy your multimedia content with the professionalism it deserves. Control brightness, conserve energy. Eco saving makes saving energy easy. It adjusts the brightness of your Samsung monitor based on how much energy you want to save. And with the choice of three energy saving modes (50%;, 25%; and Power Saving off), you can really tailor your monitor use to meet your own personal needs. Samsung’s commitment to saving energy is designed to help both you and the environment, and with up to 50%; saving on consumption, you can really make a positive impact on your eco footprint. Take the effort out of saving energy and take control with Eco saving.
name: Samsung S19B150N

description-en_US-print: The ThinkVision L190x is an ultra-slim, 19-inch monitor offering outstanding image quality with a stand that offers tilt, swivel, pivot, and height adjustments. Its ultra slim bezel is only 6.6 mm wide and saves space to provide a nearly seamless view in a multiple-monitor environment. ThinkVision L190x is thoughtfully designed, delivering high performance images even when viewed from extreme angles. These monitors are the ideal choice for multiple, dual, or tilted configurations and allow for greater collaboration and productivity. The monitor can be rotated to change from landscape to portrait viewing and the image will adjust automatically. The ThinkVision L190x is in the Performance ThinkVision family of monitors. It is best suited for specialized applications in multi-monitor environments where quick access to USB ports is needed. Features & Benefits: - 19-in viewable image size - Native resolution of 1280 x 1024 - ThinkVantage design - Ultra slim side bezels (6.6 mm) for multi-monitoring - Pivot for portrait or landscape viewing (graphics card dependent) - Automatic image rotating software included - Rear stand cover and clip to keep cables hidden - Carrying handle for easy transport - Direct access button for automatic image setup - Complimentary design for ThinkPad and ThinkCentre systems - Analog and DVI-D video signal connectors - Supports High Definition Content Protection (HDCP) - Compliance with ENERGY STAR 4.0 requirements - The Electronic Product Environmental Assessment Tool(EPEAT) Silver category - Four port USB hub - Kensington Lock slot for security - TCO'03 compliance - Offers attachment points for optional ThinkVision USB Soundbar (40Y7616) - Analog and digital connectors provide attachment flexibility - Wide viewing angles (178 degrees both horizontal and vertical) for multi-monitoring - Dual input connectors allow attachment to two systems simultaneously - Windows Vista Premium Certified - 31 Watt power consumption via internal power - Kensington lock slot - Meets 100 mm VESA standard for mounting - Detachable base for wall- or arm-mounting (sold separately) - Available in business black
description-en_US-mobile: ThinkVision L190x, 48.26 cm (19 ") TFT LCD, 1280x1024, 25ms, 1500:1, 250cd/m2, TCO'03

description-fr_FR-print: Série G L'Acer G Series affiche vos divertissements et applications bureautiques en haute définition sur son écran large au format cinématographique. Élégante et fonctionnelle, elle se distingue par ses multiples qualités! De toute beauté L'encadrement noir poli et le pied de type 'aviation' composent un look de toute beauté, pour un écran qui se connecte à un PC ou comme second écran d'un notebook. Brillant Remarquable résolution, temps de réponse ultrarapide, contraste de haut niveau, détails et fluidité sans précédent… vos divertissements n'ont jamais été aussi brillants! Avec son format 16:9, l'Acer G Series affiche idéalement vos films et contenus TVHD. Deux haut-parleurs intégrés (optionnels) complètent la qualité d'affichage en créant une véritable troisième dimension audio! Hyperfonctionnel Il suffit d'appuyer sur la touche 'Sources' du menu principal et l'Acer G Series recherche automatique les signaux entrants via les ports VGA, DVI et HDMI®. La touche Empowering affiche instantanément le gestionnaire Acer eColor Management, qui permet d'ajuster les paramètres et les couleurs selon vos préférences, pour un plaisir visuel maximal.
description-en_US-print: Slim and elegant Everyday Series monitors save space and add elegance to any area. A range of classy looks are on offer, from super-thin profiles to blue-lit power buttons, round- to X-shaped bases, and wood-textured detailing to glossy black bezels. Whichever model you choose, you're in for beautiful views. Vivid You'll enjoy tasks and entertainment more with fine details and smooth movement, thanks to high resolutions, fast response times and superior contrast ratios. Games are more exciting and films truly cinematic when visuals are vibrant. Plus, the widescreen aspect ratio frames movies and HDTV content perfectly. Easy Set your display as you see fit with Acer eColor Management. A host of ports,1 including HDMI®, DVI, DisplayPort™ and VGA, let you connect other devices -- like your notebook or HDTV -- to expand your perspective to a bigger screen. The great sights are complemented by nice sound in models that include internal speakers. Green Safe for you and your world, Everyday Series monitors are RoHS compliant, use mercury-free white LED backlighting1 and meet ENERGY STAR® 5.01 requirements. Acer EcoDisplay technologies deliver up to 68% power savings, further conserving energy and costs. Acer packaging is made of recyclable materials, too.
description-de_DE-print: Platzsparendes Design Monitore der Everyday Serie sind platzsparend und verleihen jedem Bereich eine gewisse Eleganz. Es sind verschiedene elegante Looks verfügbar, von super flachen Profilen bis hin zu blau hinterleuchteten Ein/Aus-Tasten, runden bis x-förmigen Sockeln und Details in Holzstruktur bis hin zu glänzenden schwarzen Blenden. Ganz gleich, für welches Modell Sie sich auch entscheiden: Schöne Aussichten sind Ihnen sicher. Ihre Aufgaben und Entertainment machen Ihnen mit stilvollen Details und eleganten Bewegungen dank der hohen Auflösungen, schnellen Reaktionszeiten und hervorragenden Kontrastverhältnisse noch mehr Freude. Bei einer lebendigen Grafikqualität sind Spiele noch spannender und Filme noch authentischer. Zudem bietet das Breitbildformat einen perfekten Rahmen für Filme und HDTV-Inhalt Einfache Handhabung Stellen Sie mit Acer eColor Management Ihr Display so ein, wie Sie es wünschen. Dank einer Vielzahl von Ports,1 einschließlich HDMI®, DVI, DisplayPort™ und VGA, können Sie andere Geräte anschließen, z. B. Ihr Notebook oder Ihren HDTV, um Bilder auf einem größeren Bildschirm zu genießen. Umweltfreundlich Sicher für Sie und die Umwelt: Everyday Series Monitore sind RoHS-zertifiziert, verwenden weiße, quecksilberfreie LED-Hintergrundbeleuchtung 1 und erfüllen zudem die Anforderungen von ENERGY STAR® 5.01. Acer EcoDisplay-Technologie ermöglicht Verbrauchseinsparungen von bis zu 68 %, was zu weiteren Kosten- und Energieeinsparungen führt. Zudem besteht die Verpackung von Acer aus recyclebarem Material.
name: Acer G G226HQLBbd

description-en_US-print: LG D2500N. Display resolution: 1920 x 1080, Display: LED, Display technology: TN+Film. Headphone connectivity: 3.5 mm. VESA mounting interfaces compatibility: 75 x 75, Tilt angle: -5 - 20. Input voltage: 90 - 240, Power consumption (standby): 0.5, Power consumption (off): 0.5. Cables included: DVI, USB, VGA
description-de_DE-print: LG 3D-Monitor mit 63,5 cm (25 Zoll) Bildschirmdiagonale, Eye-Tracking-Technologie und Full HD-Auflösung\n\nMit dem LG D2500N 3D-Monitor erleben Sie eine kleine Revolution: Dank der Verwendung von Parallax-Barrieren in Verbindung mit einer eingebauten Eye-Tracking-Kamera können Sie ab sofort 3D ohne Brille genießen. Die innovative Technologie passt die 3D-Inhalte stets Ihrer Kopfposition an und sorgt so für ein optimales Sehvergnügen – ohne Flackern, Flimmern oder Übersprecheffekte. Das ist aber noch nicht alles: Mit der beiliegenden TriDef-3D-Software können 2D-Inhalte in 3D umgewandelt werden. Selbstverständlich kann der Monitor auch im 2D-Modus betrieben werden. Zudem überzeugt das Full HD-Panel mit einem 170° großen Blickwinkel, einem sagenhaften Kontrastverhältnis von 5.000.000:1 und einer schnellen Reaktionszeit von 5 ms. Und auch für optimale Konnektivität ist gesorgt – mit dem zukunftssicheren DVI-D-Anschluss mit HDCP-Kopierschutzunterstützung sowie dem analogen 15 Pin D-Sub-Anschluss für ältere Geräte. So steht Ihrem dreidimensionalen Sehvergnügen garantiert nichts mehr im Wege.
description-de_DE-mobile: 3D, 63.5 cm (25 ") TFT-LCD, 1920 x 1080, 250cd/m2, DCR 5000000:1, 5ms, 1 x HDMI 1.3, 1 x DVI-D, 1 x VGA, 40W, Schwarz
name: LG D2500N

description-fr_FR-print: Moniteur LED Full HD 21,5 pouces (54cm)\nLes moniteurs LG de la série E42 font rimer informatique et intelligence. Ces écrans haut de gamme 16/9ème et Full HD intègrent une suite complète de fonctionnalités intuitives. Ainsi, nos écrans informatiques ont la faculté d’ajuster leur luminosité selon l’intensité lumineuse ambiante. Les moniteurs E42 sont également « design » avec une esthétique proche de celle des téléviseurs : tons noirs laqués, lignes élégantes et sobres… Disponibles en 22, 23, 24 pouces et 27 pouces.
description-en_US-print: PREPARE TO BE DAZZLED. Want deeper blacks and richer colors? LG's LED technology provides even greater control of brightness and delivers better contrast, amazing clarity and color detail, as well as greater energy efficiency compared to conventional LCD monitors. ULTRA SLIM DESIGN You'll love the stunning picture while it's on and marvel at its appearance when it's off. It’s a sleek, elegant design that will appeal to even the most refined sense of style. DOUBLE THE DETAIL. This stunning picture is the reason you wanted HD in the first place. With almost double the pixel resolution, Full HD 1080p gives it superior picture quality over standard resolution. You’ll see details and colors like never before. SAVE MORE THAN ENERGY. Earning the ENERGY STAR means a product meets strict energy efficiency guidelines set by the US Environmental Protection Agency and the Department of Energy. For Monitors, it means they save energy both in standby and active (when they're on) modes. ENERGY STAR qualified Monitors use about 25% less energy than standard units.
description-de_DE-print: SUPER LED-Monitor mit 54,61 cm (21,5 Zoll) Bildschirmdiagonale, schlankem Hairline-Design und Mega-Kontrast\nErleben Sie mit dem LG E2242T alle Vorteile der SUPER LED-Technologie: natürliche Farbbrillanz, ultrahoher Kontrast und tiefes Schwarz. Das schnelle Full HD-Panel überzeugt zudem mit einer schnellen Reaktionszeit von nur 5 ms, dem 170° großen Blickwinkel und einem Kontrastverhältnis von 5.000.000:1. Der zukunftssichere DVI-D-Anschluss mit HDCP-Kopierschutzunterstützung und der analoge 15 Pin D-Sub-Anschluss für ältere Geräte sorgen für optimale Konnektivität. Dank vereinfachtem Kabelmanagement bleibt Ihnen dabei ab sofort lästiges Kabelgewirr auf dem Schreibtisch erspart. Senken Sie außerdem durch die Super Energy Saving Plus-Funktion Ihren Energieverbrauch um bis zu 30 % gegenüber herkömmlichen LED-Geräten – ohne jeglichen Performanceverlust.
name: LG E2242T-BN

description-fr_FR-print: Les moniteurs LG de la série E42 font rimer informatique et intelligence. Ces écrans haut de gamme 16/9ème et Full HD intègrent une suite complète de fonctionnalités intuitives. Ainsi, nos écrans informatiques ont la faculté d’ajuster leur luminosité selon l’intensité lumineuse ambiante. Les moniteurs E42 sont également « design » avec une esthétique proche de celle des téléviseurs : tons noirs laqués, lignes élégantes et sobres… Disponibles en 22, 23, 24 pouces et 27 pouces.
description-en_US-print: The LG E42 range boasts an LED Back-lit display delivering crystal-clear images, true black and the most vivid, life-like colours, embodied in a slim design with a cable management system that neatly tucks away messy cables. The E42’s SUPER Energy Saving function saves an additional 30% Energy than conventional LED monitors. FULL HD FULL HD resolution brings you magnificent picture quality through outstanding colour accuracy, visual contrast and sharpness. MEGA CONTRAST RATIO LG's Mega Contrast Ratio technology delivers an outstanding contrast ratio that enhances picture brightness and clarity. CABLE MANAGEMENT The Cable Management design solves your messy cable problems that hang down from your monitor. VESA WALL MOUNT You can wall mount your E42 monitor and bring a sense of style and space saving to your interior design. SUPER ENERGY SAVING Save an additional 30% energy compared to conventional LED monitors while achieving the best performance possible.
name: LG E2342T

description-fr_FR-print:
Moniteur LED TV 27" T27B300
Une expérience sans limite grâce à de nombreuses entrées vidéo
Ne vous limitez plus seulement à vos films préférés! Les moniteurs Samsung possèdent 1 entrée HDMI ainsi qu’un large éventail d’entrées permettant tous les usages: jeux vidéo, photos, vidéo, chaque expérience devient intense et incroyablement vivante. Les différentes entrées telles que VGA, HDMI, Péritel et USB, assurent une parfaite compatibilité de votre moniteur à tous vos périphériques.
Passez au niveau supérieur avec le contraste Mega DCR (Dynamic Contrast Ratio)
Découvrez une image de haute qualité avec une incroyable richesse de couleurs grâce au taux de contraste amélioré (un taux de contraste parmi les plus élevés actuellement disponibles). Le moniteur Samsung T27B300 délivre des images tellement réalistes que vous verrez chaque couleur, chaque détail prendre vie sur votre écran. Vous serez impressionné par la profondeur des noirs et la richesse des couleurs rendant l’image incroyablement naturelle. Elevez votre expérience visuelle à un niveau supérieur et profitez de vos meilleurs contenus grâce au contraste Méga DCR du Samsung T27B300.
Branchez et regardez grâce à ConnectShare™
Connectez une clé USB ou un Disque Dur à votre moniteur pour profiter de vos photos sans avoir à passer par un ordinateur.

description-en_US-print: The HP 2011x offers a perfect combination of screen performance, sleek design, and responsible features with a 50,8 cm (20") diagonal LED Backlit LCD panel that can help enhance your user experience. Features Enjoy extra benefits The HP 2011x, with LED backlighting, delivers benefits over CCFL that include: the elimination of mercury, the use of solid state components to enable a thin, robust product, and quick on/off switching times to help save energy. Enhance your experience The stylish, ultra-slim HP 2011x looks great in your office environment without taking up valuable space, while adjustable tilt settings enable clear views from many angles so you can be more comfortable and productive. Boost your performance Get crisp, clear, views on a 1600 x 900 native resolution screen with a 3M:1 dynamic contrast ratio, up to a 170° viewing angle, and fast 5ms response times[1] . As well, DVD-D and VGA inputs enable advanced connectivity. Reduce your impact With the use of Mercury-free LEDs and arsenic-free display glass[2], along with an ENERGY STAR® qualification and an EPEAT® Silver registration[3], the HP 2011x can help reduce your environmental impact.

description-de_DE-print: Der HP 2011x ist die perfekte Kombination aus erstklassigen Leistungsmerkmalen, einem kompakten Design und umweltfreundlichen Features. Der LCD-Bildschirm hat eine Diagonale von 50,8 cm (20") sowie eine LED-Hintergrundbeleuchtung und ermöglicht ein noch angenehmeres Arbeiten. Merkmale - Der HP 2011x mit LED-Hintergrundbeleuchtung bietet gegenüber CCFL-Monitoren (Cold Cathode Fluorescent Lamp) eine Reihe von Vorteilen: kein Quecksilber, Verwendung von Solid-State-Komponenten als Grundlage für einen kompakten und widerstandsfähigen Monitor und kurze Ein-/Ausschaltzeiten, um den Energieverbrauch zu senken. - Der stilvolle und schmale HP 2011x passt hervorragend in Ihre Arbeitsumgebung und benötigt nur sehr wenig Platz, während die anpassbaren Einstellungen eine gute Sicht aus verschiedenen Blickwinkeln ermöglichen, damit Sie komfortabler und produktiver arbeiten können. - Detailgetreue, hochauflösende Anzeige mit einer nativen Auflösung von 1600x900, einem dynamischen Kontrastverhältnis von 3.000.000:1, einem Blickwinkel von bis zu 170° und einer Reaktionszeit von nur 5 ms.1 Die DVD-D- und VGA-Eingänge bieten noch mehr Anschlussmöglichkeiten. - Der HP 2011x sorgt aufgrund der quecksilberfreien LEDs, des arsenfreien Display-Glases2, der ENERGY STAR®-Zertifizierung und der EPEAT® Silver-Registrierung3 für eine geringere Umweltbelastung.

True-to-life Pictures Powered by LED 50,000,000:1 ASUS Smart Contrast Ratio Dynamically enhances the display’s contrast by adjusting the luminance of the backlight to achieve the darkest black and brightest white – delivering lifelike images. Full HD 1080p Support Enter a spectacular world of colors with Full HD 1080p (1920x1080) support. Versatile viewing positions with Smart View Technology When you would like to watch movies upward lying down, Smart View Technology can adjust color parameters to deliver the same image quality and colors with straight viewing. Aspect Control function Aspect Control function allows users to select a preferred display mode among Full and 4:3 for true-to-life gaming or movie watching without any data loss or image distortion. Splendid™ Video Intelligence Technology The exclusive Splendid Video Intelligence Technology optimizes video performance and image fidelity by enhancing color, brightness, contrast, and sharpness. 6 preset video modes (Scenery, Theater, Game, Night View, sRGB and Standard) can be selected via a hotkey. Stylish and User-friendly Design for Modern Sophistication - Convenient key controls for functional set-up in the multi-language OSD. - Easily detachable base for wall mount. - VESA Wall Mount Standard (100 x 100 mm ). - 25° ( forward 5°, backwards 20° )Tilting Angle. - KENSINGTON Security Lock. Complete After-Sale Service - 3-year system warranty - 3-year panel warranty - Free pick-up service (in specific countries) Green in Mind Greener Materials - Mercury-free LED-backlit panel - Corrugated cardboard packaging with at least 80% recycled content - Slim-flat packaging allows more cartons to be fitted per cargo, reducing transportation costs and CO₂ emission Energy and Planet Saving - 37.2k Wh electricity saving - 23.6kg reduction in CO₂emissions, equivalent to: - 1.9 trees planted - 2 years of oxygen for a family of four

description-en_US-print: Breakthrough Picture Quality With LED Technology Samsung's LED monitors deliver a visually stunning picture quality that leaves you speechless. Just as you’ve seen in Samsung LED TV’s, our LED monitors make colors more rich and the action more real than you’ve dreamt possible. Let the story come to life with vivid colors and crystal-clear detail. Ultra Slim Design with High Glossy Finish Remember when you replaced your bulky CRT monitor with a slimmer LCD monitor? The next leap forward is here. Samsung LED technology enables striking, ultra-thin displays. As slim as 11.4 mm, LED monitors add elegance to your desk. They are also very lightweight, making them easy to lift and move. Perfect Viewing from Every Angle Enjoy a rich, high contrast image from various angles of view, whether you’re viewing from straight on, above, below or the side. While the picture washes out on a normal monitor, Samsung MagicAngle offers consistently outstanding color and contrast. Watch Full 1080p HD Video with HDMI Watch Full 1080p HD Video with HDMI Monitors aren’t just for computers any more. Now you can watch TV programs, movies, or play your game console on your monitor too. Simply select a monitor with an HDMI port and connect it to your cable box, BluRay player, HD game system, or any other device with an HDMI output. Best of all, you can connect your computer to a different video port (VGA) and switch back and forth without having to unplug anything. To switch between inputs, press the “Source” button on the monitor. Rated EPEAT® Gold Standard By meeting and exceeding the highest green standards, this product has been rated GOLD by the EPEAT®. The rating is based on the environmental impact in a complete product lifecycle, so consumers can easily match high-performance electronics with green benefits. Earning this top rating means this product surpasses standard green criteria by at least 75%.
name: Samsung S20B350H

description-en_US-print: 2 in 1: HDTV Monitor Combo Samsung’s high-performance TB350 Series LED HDTV monitor combo has all of the key features you would expect from a premium HDTV and a premium monitor. Samsung’s LED backlighting provides an efficient, crystal-clear image and an Energy Star 5.0 rating. With the built-in DTV tuner, Picture-in-Picture (PiP) and ConnectShare™ USB media player, the TB350 can also be the perfect way to watch all of your favorite TV programs as well as access movies, pictures and music without even turning your computer on. Breakthrough Picture Quality Samsung's LED monitors deliver a visually stunning picture quality that leaves you speechless. Just as you’ve seen in Samsung LED TV’s, our LED monitors make colors more rich and the action more real than you’ve dreamt possible. Let the story come to life with vivid colors and crystal-clear detail. USB Media Player Eliminate the need of turning on your PC or laptop to share your digital content with ConnectShare™ USB media player. With ConnectShare™, you can connect a USB memory drive or other USB device directly into the HDTV Monitor, and immediately access a wide range of digital content such as movies, photos, and music. ConnectShare™ allows you to enjoy all the content you would normally access through your PC, now without your PC. 2 HDMI Inputs Built with two High Definition Multimedia Interface (HDMI) inputs, the Samsung HDTV Monitor can now be considered to be a complete multimedia entertainment center. HDMI provides high definition digital data from devices including set-top boxes, DVD and Blu-ray players, and gaming consoles, straight into your HDTV Monitor. Plus, you can use HDMI inputs to connect Mobile High-definition Link compatible devices such as mobile phones and portable consumer electronics to your Samsung HDTV monitor. That means you can now enjoy a wider variety of content at the highest quality.

description-en_US-print: LG Cloud Monitor U Series embedded multi computing monitor with Windows Multipoint Server 2011. With the U Series, you can connect multiple cloud monitors to a single host PC using a USB cable. Monitors can serve as an independent PC for users to perform various tasks. Without any installation process, monitors can easily be connected to the host via USB, making multi-computing easier than ever. In addition, the LG Cloud Monitor U Series minimizes initial set up cost and power consumption as well as reduces the maintenance time and cost associated with multiple PC’s. The U Series platform is optimized for various computing environments such as SMB, public area, etc. where word processing, video playing, internet, e-mail, and simple applications are used. Especially for education institutions, U series empowers educators, engages students, and makes learning personal.
name: LG N225WU-BN

description-en_US-print: Experience amazing new levels of color, brilliance and picture quality through the very latest in Mega Dynamic Contrast Ratio. Samsung SA300 monitors deliver images so real-to-life that it will transform your whole viewing experience. It is like an explosion of colors and leaves other screens seeming dull in comparison. So, take your viewing pleasure to the next level with Samsung Mega Dynamic Contrast Ratio – and enjoy your multimedia content with the professionalism it deserves. Control brightness, conserve energy. Eco saving makes saving energy easy. It adjusts the brightness of your Samsung monitor based on how much energy you want to save. And with the choice of three energy saving modes (50%, 25% and Power Saving off), you can really tailor your monitor use to meet your own personal needs. Samsung’s commitment to saving energy is designed to help both you and the environment, and with up to 50% saving on consumption, you can really make a positive impact on your eco footprint. Take the effort out of saving energy and take control with Eco saving. See it your way with wider viewing angles. How do you like to watch movies? Do you like lying down on the couch? Sitting in your favorite chair? Cooking or exercising? Whether you’re standing, sitting or lying down, Samsung Magic Angle makes sure that the movie always takes center stage and that you’re always comfortable. This means, thanks to the 5-mode angle management, that whatever angle you watch your Samsung monitor, you will enjoy a full visual experience with amazing picture clarity. So, start seeing your favorite movies and other multimedia in total comfort and without limitations thanks to Magic Angle.
name: Samsung S22B300B

description-en_US-print: Expand your experience with various inputs Why not bring more than just your favourite films to life? Samsung’s LED Monitor 2HDMI with its wide range of inputs ensures that everything from gaming to chatting with friends online is easily achieved. The various inputs such as DP, 2HDMI and DVI, ensure that your monitor is more compatible and ready to handle all of your content. Plug in and watch your content with ConnectShare™ If you just can’t wait to see you digital content, whether it is your movies, pictures or music, then don’t waste your precious time and make the most of ConnectShare™. By simply connecting your memory device (HDD or USB) to your LED monitor TB350 via the USB port, ConnectShare™ lets you view your content without having to turn on your PC or laptop. It is all about letting you just enjoy your content, and is just another way the TB350 brings convenience to your day. Upgrade to the next level with Mega Dynamic Contrast Experience amazing new levels of colour, brilliance and picture quality through the very latest in Mega Dynamic Contrast Ratio. Samsung LED TB350 monitors deliver images so real-to-life that it will transform your whole viewing experience. Packed with breathtaking 5000000:1 contrast ratio, the highest level currently available, the TB350 monitor ensures that blacks are at their absolute darkest and (with pristine whites) colours are at their brightest. You will immediately notice the crystal clear picture and its unbelievable intensity. It is like an explosion of colours and leaves other screens seeming dull in comparison. So, take your viewing pleasure to the next level with Samsung Mega Dynamic Contrast Ratio – and enjoy your multimedia content with the professionalism it deserves.

description-en_US-print:
The 70” P702 professional-grade, large-screen LCD display offers industrial-strength, 24/7 operation for the most demanding digital signage installations. Along with its sturdy mechanical design, this display offers full high-definition resolution for smooth video and crisp imagery. Its advanced connectivity with integrated digital loop-through and Open Pluggable Specification (OPS) via the built-in expansion slot enable you to easily connect components to run your digital signage. With TileMatrix™ technology, you can build a video wall up to 100 displays to maximize impact with your audience, while monitoring your network from a remote location with the most advanced control and communication options available. The P702 is ideal in quick-service restaurants, airports, public information environments, healthcare facilities and retail stores.

- Industrial-strength, premium-grade panel with additional thermal protection, internal temperature sensors with self-diagnostics and fan-based technology, allows for 24/7 operation
- Open Pluggable Specification is the industry's first standardized option slot that simplifies digital signage installations
- Built-in expansion slot allows for seamless integration of NEC/third-party components, as well as future OPS-based products
- Expanded connectivity with digital loop-through
- Full 1080p high-definition resolution provides stunning detail
- Comprehensive input panel connects you to the latest peripherals, including DisplayPort, HDMI, DVI, VGA, composite and component
- TileMatrix allows you to create video walls up to 10 x 10
name: NEC P702

LG a commercialisé récemment sa gamme E42C de moniteurs économes en énergie qui permet de réduire la consommation d'énergie jusqu'à 50% par rapport à d'autres moniteurs de même taille. Principales caractéristiques: - Format 16:9. - Luminosité 250 cd/m2. - Résolution Full HD. - Taux de contraste de 5M:1. - Temps de réponse 5ms. - Eco-Friendly (jusqu’à 40% d’économie d’énergie).
